actions.text: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 205 (Roll no. 42).
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Curtis.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 205 (Roll no. 42).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 205 (Roll no. 42).

description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 117-6 to require a study to determine if any land withdrawn by this legislation contains geothermal resources, or minerals needed for battery storage, renewable energy technology, or electric vehicles.
purpose: Amendment requires a study to determine if any land withdrawn by the legislation contains geothermal resources, or minerals needed for battery storage, renewable energy technology, or electric vehicles.
